archimate:Grouping.name: Anskaffelser, utvikling og forvaltning av produkter og tjenester
archimate:Grouping.documentation: Ability to conceptualize, design, develop, bundle, source, maintain, and retire a named combination of goods and doing-of-work-for-others that can be offered to constituents, in whole or in part, to satisfy a constituent’s needs.

properties.value: Innkjøp, utvikling og forvaltning av produkter og tjenester

Ability to conceptualize, design, develop, bundle, source, maintain, and retire a named combination of goods and doing-of-work-for-others that can be offered to constituents, in whole or in part, to satisfy a constituent’s needs.
